subject: [Radiance-general] Radiance training cours
body:
Dear All,



I'm looking for a training course of Radiance for a professional ligthing consultant team.

We are based in Hong Kong, China region, though, any locational option for the training

could be considered / or could invite a trainer here.

Appreciate if anyone know reccomendable trainig courses / educational institutions

and give some information about that to me.



Kindly,

Naoko Ide
